front.title: LMA Discovery for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: Large Proxy Mobile IPv6 deployments would benefit from a functionality, where a Mobile Access Gateway could dynamically discover a Local Mobility Anchor for a Mobile Node attaching to a Proxy Mobile IPv6 domain. The purpose of the dynamic discovery functionality is to reduce the amount of static configuration in the Mobile Access Gateway. This specification describes a number of possible dynamic Local Mobility Anchor discovery solutions.
